pma:database.name: neogame
pma:database.pma:table: CREATE TABLE `attackmodes` ( `id` int(4) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `strName` varchar(255) NOT NULL, `strNotes` varchar(255) NOT NULL, `nRange` int(2) NOT NULL DEFAULT '1', `fDamageCut` float NOT NULL DEFAULT '0', `fDamageBlunt` float NOT NULL DEFAULT '0', `strChargeProfiles` varchar(24) NOT NULL, `nPenetration` int(2) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0', `nType` int(1) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0', `strSnd` varchar(30) NOT NULL, `bTransfer` tinyint(1) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0', `vAttackerConditions` varchar(255) NOT NULL, `strIMG` varchar(50) NOT NULL, `fMorale` float NOT NULL DEFAULT '0.25', `strWieldPhrase` longtext NOT NULL, `vAttackPhrases` longtext NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`id`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB AUTO_INCREMENT=62 DEFAULT CHARSET=latin1;
